Name: Member
Description: Base role for all registered users. Can book appointments and access member features

Name: Expert Community
Description: Standard expert tier with core expert features. Pays 20% commission (monthly) or 12% (annual)

Name: Expert Top
Description: Premium expert tier with advanced features. Pays 18% commission (monthly) or 8% (annual)

Name: Team Member
Description: Member of a team organization. Can manage their own practice and view shared team resources

Name: Team Admin
Description: Administrator of a team organization. Can manage team, patients, schedule, and settings

Name: Platform Admin
Description: Platform-level administrator with full system access. For Eleva Care team only
